View RRH Details

Use this task to view Remote Radio Head (RRH) device operational information, which includes its cells.

  1. From the navigation bar, select Devices > RRH Details.
  2. In the RRH window, select a vBBU from the Associated vBBU drop-down list and view the system fields in the RRH Device Details pane that are described in the table below:

    Field

    Description
    Active Displays the number of antenna ports on the RRH that are active.
    Number of TX Antennas Displays the number of transmit antennaes on the RRH.
    Number of RX Antennas Displays the number of receive antennaes on the RRH.
    Number of Carriers Displays the number of carriers using this RRH device.
    Max Power Displays the maximum power consumption for this RRH device. For example, 530 watts.
    Band Displays the LTE 3GPP frequency band supported by this RRH device. For example, Band 3 (4G) LTE access service has a Down-Link (DL) frequency range of 1805-1880 MHz and Up-Link (UL) frequency range of 1710-1785 MHz..
    Version Displays the version of software running on the RRH device.
Parent topic: Device Configuration and Management
